articles.title: FM Spokesman Blasts US Human Rights Report
articles.content:
FM Spokesman Blasts US Human Rights Report
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry issued the following statement on Tuesday denouncing the U.S. for malignantly slandering the DPRK and other independent countries opposed to its hegemony in the "2011 human rights report" on May 24:
					 It is the inveterate bad habit of the U.S. to regard the human rights issue as a political tool for realizing its strategy for world domination. The U.S. considers any country kowtowing to it as "guiltless" but declares any country opposed to its domination "guilty" without verifying truth about human rights. This is the real picture of the trial of human rights issues repeated by the U.S. every year.
					
					 The DPRK is always mentioned in this report as it is the state which the U.S. antagonizes more than any other country. The U.S. unchanged human rights racket against the DPRK is, in essence, a product of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK to isolate and stifle at any cost its socialist system chosen by the Korean people themselves and, at the same time, a hideous human rights abuse denying the choice by the people of a country.
					
					 We bitterly condemn the despicable human rights report worked out by the U.S. styling itself the so-called "law-governed state" and "an intelligence-gathering power" on the basis of "rumors" concocted by a handful of traitors and criminals to earn living expenses after running away from their country and families.
					
					 It is quite natural that many countries of the world are scathingly denouncing the U.S. human rights report as the height of politicization of human rights and double standards and a dustbin of all distortions and fabrications. By nature, the U.S. has resorted to all military threats and nuclear blackmail against the DPRK in a bid to stifle it by force of arms for decades. But they compelled the DPRK to have access to nuclear weapons and bolster up its nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The U.S. is raising "human rights issue" and "issue of people's living" these days. High-ranking officials of the U.S. are letting loose a spate of remarks in an attempt to create an impression that they are interested in the living of the people of the DPRK but it is the U.S. which has most persistently and desperately obstructed its efforts to develop economy and improve the standard of people's living.
					
					 On April 15 the dear respected Kim Jong Un solemnly declared at home and abroad that it is the steadfast resolution of the Workers' Party of Korea not to let the Korean people tighten their belts again but make them fully enjoy wealth and happiness under socialism. The next day the U.S. took such criminal action as slapping economic sanctions against the DPRK again by taking issue with its satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					 It is the gangster-like logic of the U.S. that those countries which it antagonizes should not be allowed to increase defence capabilities and to this end they should be barred from having access to technology or materials for dual use even if they hinder peaceful economic development.
					
					 The U.S. is paying lip-service to the "people's living" while hindering the DPRK's economic development in actuality. This is part of the U.S. foolish psychological operation to make a crack in the single-minded unity of the DPRK and destabilize it.
					
					 The U.S. has no moral qualification to raise a human rights issue or an issue of people's living to the DPRK as long as the U.S. sticks to its anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. brutally suppressed those toiling masses who staged Occupy the Wall Street demos and anti-war demos in protest against the capitalist system under which the rich gets richer and the poor poorer and the war policy of the authorities and massacred hundreds of thousands of innocent civilians in different parts of the world through aggression and interference. This world's worst human rights abuser the U.S. is behaving as if it were "a human rights judge." This reminds one of a thief shouting "Stop the thief!" 
					
					 If the U.S. continues vulgarizing the human rights issue as a political lever for achieving its selfish purpose as now, it will never be able to escape international isolation as shown by the widespread international criticism of this report.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets Pakistani Ambassador
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets Pakistani Ambassador
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, Tuesday had a talk with Arif Mahmood, Pakistani ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him.

articles.title: DPRK Youth League Delegation Returns Home
articles.content:
DPRK Youth League Delegation Returns Home
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League led by Jong Yong Won, department director of the Central Committee of the youth league, came back home on Tuesday after attending the meeting of the General Council of the World Federation of Democratic Youth in Zimbabwe.

articles.title: Gift from Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Gift from Chinese Delegation
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by the visiting delegation of the State Administration for Industry and Commerce of China (SAICC).
					 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned by Vice Minister of SAICC Fu Shuangjian on Tuesday.

articles.title: MOU on Commerce Signed between DPRK and China
articles.content:
MOU on Commerce Signed between DPRK and China
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- A MOU on cooperation was signed here on Tuesday between the Office for Trademark, Industrial Design and Products Origin of the DPRK and the State Administration for Industry and Commerce of China.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were officials of the above-said office including its general director Ri Tong Chan and from the Chinese side members of the delegation of the State Administration for Industry and Commerce of China led by Vice Minister Fu Shuangjian and a staff member of the Chinese embassy here.

articles.title: Sojourn of Chinese Delegation Visits Statues of DPRK Leaders
articles.content:
Sojourn of Chinese Delegation Visits Statues of DPRK Leaders
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the State Administration for Industry and Commerce of China led by Vice Minister Fu Shuangjian Tuesday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 The members of the delegation laid bouquets before the statues and made bows in boundless reverence for peerlessly great men who made immortal contributions to the development of the DPRK-China friendship and global independence.

articles.title: Sojourn of Chinese Delegation in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Sojourn of Chinese Delegation in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the State Administration for Industry and Commerce of China led by Vice Minister Fu Shuangjian visited the Tower of the Juche Idea on Tuesday.
					 Being briefed on the grand monument, the delegation members looked round stones sent by a lot of countries of the world, the tower body and group sculptures on both sides of the tower.
					
					 At the tower observation deck they enjoyed a bird's-eye view of Pyongyang.
					
					 After visiting the Tower of Friendship, the head of the delegation said that the Sino-Korean friendship of a long tradition has been invariably grown stronger.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Arch of Triumph and other places.

articles.title: Iranian Diplomats Visit PUFS
articles.content:
Iranian Diplomats Visit PUFS
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Morteza Moradian and staff members of the Iranian embassy here visited Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies on May 29 on the occasion of the week of DPRK-Iran friendship.
					 The guests looked round the room dedicated to the history of the university and a lecture room, being briefed on the fact that the university is furnished with facilities for education and scientific work to bring up able students.
					
					 At the end of the visit the ambassador said he was pleased to see the successes being achieved in the educational work of the university and the students' study.
					
					 He expressed belief that the friendly relations between two countries would steadily develop in various fields under the deep concerns of their leaders.
					
					The guests donated sports equipments to the university.

articles.title: Friendly Football Matches between DPRK, China Held
articles.content:
Friendly Football Matches between DPRK, China Held
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Friendly matches were held at Yanggakdo Football Stadium in Pyongyang between the DPRK's Ryongaksan Women's Football Team and China's women's football team.
					 The DPRK girls won the Chinese rivals 4:3 and 1:0 in two encounters held on May 26 and 29.

articles.title: Selection of KCU Delegates Made as Great Event
articles.content:
Selection of KCU Delegates Made as Great Event
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The whole country is alive with the selection of delegates to the celebrations of the 66th anniversary of the Korean Children's Union (KCU). This is regarded as a great event as children of ordinary working people from unknown villages, remote mountain villages and island villages are chosen as delegates of the KCU to those events. 
					 Pak Chang Hae, second-year student of Hongui Secondary School in Rason City who is vice-chairman of the KCU organization of the school, was selected as a delegate to the celebrations, deeply moving people.
					
					  His parents are cripples. Upon hearing the news, they shed tears of emotion, saying words fail to express gratitude for the great happiness bestowed upon their child though they have long received boundless loving care.
					
					 Not only officials of a rural village but villagers visited the child's house to sincerely congratulate them.
					
					 Old man Ja Ul Gun aged more than 70 in this place said that the country is, indeed, a good society. Although the child's parents are crippled, the country brought up their child without discrimination and brought him such honor of being a delegate to such big event, he noted, adding that this can happen only in the country blessed with the illustrious leaders. 
					
					 Four children of Sokju and Sogang branch schools of the Osu Secondary School in Junggang County, Jagang Province, were also chosen as delegates to the celebrations of the KCU. They are children of farmers and pensioners. The whole village and branch schools are in a festive mood as this thing is hardly imaginable in the capitalist society.
					
					 Parents and inhabitants of the Munam Branch School of Hwanggok Primary School in Myongchon County, North Hamgyong Province, the Iljabong Branch School of Kaeunsong Secondary School in Samsu County, Ryanggang Province and Oyu Secondary School in Popdong County, Kangwon Province in deep mountain villages were excited to hear that children of ordinary workers and farmers got an opportunity to go to Pyongyang under the loving care of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Inhabitants of villages on the island were greatly pleased to hear that children of workers and soldier families in the Sindo Branch School of Namhae Secondary School and the Pukdan and Namdan Branch Schools of Sagok Secondary School of Ongjin County, South Hwanghae Province in the southwestern tip of the country have got a chance to visit Pyongyang.
					
					 Kim Myong Gwang, delegate to the celebrations from Koryo Secondary School, and Han Yun Sim, delegate from Koryo Primary School in Kaesong City, lost their parents in the period of the Arduous March, the forced march. They said in an excited tone: We are no longer orphans. Our father is the dear respected Kim Jong Un and our house is the Workers' Party of Korea. We will grow up fast and become soldiers devotedly defending the party and the country.

articles.title: Korean Schoolchildren Blessed
articles.content:
Korean Schoolchildren Blessed
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- All the people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are deeply moved to hear the news that the celebrations of the 66th birthday of the Korean Children's Union (June 6) will soon take place in Pyongyang under the loving care of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 The principal of Pyongyang Saesallim Secondary School, Om Kwang Il, told KCNA:
					
					 "We, teachers, are all excited by the news that the celebrations will be held in Pyongyang to mark the 66th KCU anniversary.
					
					 It is so impressive that schoolchildren have been invited to visit Pyongyang as state guests to significantly celebrate the KCU anniversary.
					
					 This is the highest honor of the Korean schoolchildren, who learn to their hearts' contents under the deep care of Kim Jong Un. He has fully embodied the noble-minded outlook on posterity maintained by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 I will devote myself to bringing up all students to be reliable successors to the revolutionary cause of Juche, equipped with ample knowledge, high morality and strong body, true to his noble outlook on posterity."
					
					 A worker at the Chollima Steel Complex, Hwang Chol Ho, said that he was surprised to hear that his son was appointed a delegate to the celebrations. "I am sure that the loving care of the motherly Party is shown even to common workers," he added.
					
					 Ko Myong Ae, a farmer of the Naewoe Co-op Farm in Hwangju County, North Hwanghae Province, said:
					
					 "It is the happiest time for a mother to see her child's fortune.
					
					 I can hardly believe that my daughter was invited to visit Pyongyang.
					
					 I will work harder to boost grain output for the happiness of children."

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Loving Care for Children
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Loving Care for Children
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the celebrations for the 66th anniversary of the Korean Children's Union (KCU), the Korean people are sorely missing President Kim Il Sung, who cared so much for happiness of posterity all his life.
					 Following are some of the stories on his loving care for children.
					
					 "Debt" Owed to Children
					
					 It was one midnight in April Juche 50 (1961) when the President called some officials concerned to learn about the construction of the Pyongyang Students and Children's Palace.
					
					 An official explained him about the relief map modified to suit children's features.
					
					 Seeing the map, the President told that nothing should be spared for children though more materials and funds were needed to build the palace on an enlarged basis. And he suggested discussing its designing with children.
					
					 After a while, he said he felt indebted to children, urging the officials to build the palace as early as possible.
					
					 Celebrations for KCU anniversary
					
					 One day in January 1966, the President called a youth league official to instruct him to significantly organize the celebrations of the 20th KCU birthday.
					
					 He said the work with the KCU should never be neglected, saying that it is an important and responsible work for creditably training the reserves of the revolution.
					
					 Afterwards, he learned in detail about preparations for the celebrations to solve knotty problems.
					
					 He personally attended a joint national meeting of the KCU organizations, giving precious teachings for the development of KCU work. At the end of the meeting, he called some KCU members and officials to advise that the schoolchildren should take an active part in the organizational life and every Saturday be set as day of KCU organizational life. This teaching reflected his wish that the children would prepare themselves through organizational life to be reliable reserves shouldering the future destiny of the country.
					
					 Souvenir Picture
					
					 On June 7, 1994, one month and a day before his demise, the President had a photo session with the delegates to the 5th Congress of the KCU after attending it.
					
					 In his congratulatory letter to the Congress he expressed belief that the KCU members would grow up to be successors to the Korean revolution, intensely faithful to the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Japan's Claim to Tok Islets Termed Nonsensical
articles.content:
Japan's Claim to Tok Islets Termed Nonsensical
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The Department of History of Kim Il Sung University Monday released a detailed report branding Japan's claim to Tok Islets as brigandish sophism devoid of any legal and historical propriety.
					 According to the report, historical data clearly proves that Tok Islets have been part of the inviolable territory of Korea from ancient times.
					
					 Inhabitants of Koguryo and Silla positively advanced into Ullung Island and Tok Islets in the periods of not only ancient times but the Three States.
					
					 In particular, Koguryo expanded its territory even to Chongha region of Silla (Phohang City in Kyongsang Province) from late in the fifth century to early in the sixth century. This fact goes to prove that in that period people of Koguryo put Ullung Island and Tok Islets under their control.
					
					 Kobe (glass with high stem) used by the Koguryo people was discovered on Ullung Island recently. This is just an example clearly proving the above-said fact.
					
					 It is clear from such fact that the then inhabitants of Usan State including Ullung Island and Tok Islets were people of Koguryo.
					
					 Japan's historical data dealing with the middle, modern and contemporary history say that Tok Islets belonged to Korea.
					
					 Tok Islets began to appear in Japan's historical data from the 17th century.
					
					 Since then Tok Islets had been recorded as part of the territory of Korea in almost historical data of Japan for nearly 300 years.
					
					 Japan's historical data compiled in the 17th century contain the facts that Tsushima and the Tokugawa shogunate governments formally recognized before and after the An Ryong Bok case that the island and the islets were part of the inviolable territory of Korea.  
					
					 Different types of maps manufactured by Japan in the middle age describe the island and the islets as part of the territory of Korea.
					
					 In particular, the "Geographical History of the Three States"                        clearly specifies in Japanese by the side of Ullung Island and Tok Islets that they are part of the territory of Korea.
					
					 Ullung Island and Tok Islets are marked as part of the territory of Korea in a lot of maps produced by Japan in the modern age.
					
					 What is noteworthy is that Japan marked Tok Islets as "Song Islets" (Matsushima) (meaning a lot of pine trees grow) till the 19th century but from the early 20th century it replaced the name of Tok Islets by "Juk Islets" (Takeshima) (meaning a lot of bamboo trees grow) under the influence of British who miswrote them instead of using the original name of Ullung Island.
					
					 This fact alone clearly shows that the then Japanese had no elementary understanding of Tok Islets and they are not part of the territory of Japan.
					
					 Ullung Island and Tok Islets are recorded as part of the territory of Korea even in Japan's historical data dealing with its modern geography.
					
					  "Encyclopedia of Japan" published in Japan in 1960 refers to Tok Islets as follows: Japanese call Tok Islets Takeshima but Koreans call them Tok Islets and they are known to Europeans and Americans as Rocks.
					
					 Even according to the Japanese legal data, the "ordinance No. 24 of the Prime Minister's Office" promulgated on June 6, 1951, and the "ordinance No. 4 of the Ministry of Finance" promulgated on February 13 of the same year stipulated that Tok Islets never belonged to Japan.
					
					 Japan's historical data for nearly 300 years patently prove that Tok Islets are part of the inviolable territory of Korea. They also term Japanese reactionaries' claim to Tok Islets absurd and brigandish sophism quite contrary to historical facts. 
					
					 Historical data of Europe and the U.S. also prove that Tok Islets belonged to Korea. 
					
					 Data of Europe about Tok Islets include maps which Europeans drew after the mid-18th century during the voyage of the East Sea of Korea when they saw for themselves Tok Islets and Ullung Island, maps drawn on the basis of old ones after recognizing them, navigation charts and other sailing directions. 
					
					 In particular, the Russian navigation chart "map of the East Sea of Korea" marked Ullung Island and Tok Islets and put under it a drawing showing the shape of the islets, a clear indication that they belonged to Korea. 
					
					 Tok Islets as well as Ullung Island are marked as islands of Korea in the sailing directions "Guide to voyage" (1895, 1928) drawn by the navy of France, the sailing directions "sailing directions of China" (1858, 1861, 1864) and the "Guide to Chinese coast voyage" (1873, 1884, 1892) drawn by British people and "Guides to voyage to Japan, Korea and their adjacent coastal waters" also mark Tok Islets along with Ullung Island as islands of Korea. 
					
					 There were two confidential documents of the U.S. government which recognized Tok Islets as Korea's and they were declassified by the U.S. State Records Census Bureau in April 2005. One of them was the document which had been sent to the then south Korean "prime minister" by a brass hat of the U.S. troops in south Korea in June 1951 asking for use of Tok Islets as a drill ground of the U.S. air force. This means that the U.S. which occupied Japan when it was defeated recognized Tok Islets as part of Korean territory not Japanese and Japan was also aware of this. 
					
					 In 1995, a map manufactory of the U.S. government produced the sailing direction "Voyage guide to Korea and U.S." This marked Tok Islets and Ullung Island as Korea's with an explanation about Tok Islets and two drawings on the islets attached. 
					
					 This shows that the U.S. has long recognized Korea's dominium over Tok Islets. 
					
					 A map drawn in 1946 discovered in the U.S. also clearly marked Tok Islets as Korea's. 
					
					 As shown by historical data, Tok Islets are part of the inalienable territory of Korea as it can never be a dispute in any case. 
					
					 The world recognizes Korea's dominium over Tok Islets. 
					
					 The participants of an international symposium on Tok Islets held in Washington in May 2009 unanimously said Korea's dominium over Tok Islets was beyond any doubt as there were historical materials proving that Tok Islets were part of the Korean territory in the period of the Three States and Japan-made maps (1700-1800) marked Tok Islets as part of Korea's territory. Nevertheless, Japan asserted "dominium" over Tok Islets in 1905 first and Japan's assertion is sophism devoid of any historical ground. 
					
					 This being hard facts, the Japanese reactionaries persistently talk about "dominium" over Tok Islets, which is ridiculous from the historical viewpoint and in the light of international law. Their ulterior intention is to make Tok Islets a target of dispute and pave the way for reinvasion of Korea under this pretext. 
					
					 Japan should not be allowed to touch even a stone on Tok Islets. 
					
					 Tok Islets will always stand as part of the inalienable territory of Korea.

articles.title: US Accused of Intention to Keep Pro-US Regime: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
US Accused of Intention to Keep Pro-US Regime: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- It was reported that an expert on Korean affairs of the U.S. Centre for Strategic and International Studies and former high ranking U.S. officials flew into Seoul to meet "presidential" candidates including Park Geun Hye and exhaustively tap their "views on the north", etc. before the "presidential election" slated to take place in December. 
					 Rodong Sinmun on Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: This is an open interference in the internal affairs of south Korea and reveals the sinister intention to calm down the daily growing desire of the people for independent reunification and zealously back the ultra-right conservative forces in a bid to prolong the pro-U.S. dictatorship system. 
					
					 It is not secret that the U.S. has so far arbitrarily controlled south Korean politics, it says, and goes on:
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the U.S. tricksters got nervous about sounding out south Korean "presidential" candidates' views and understanding of the DPRK. 
					
					 The south Korean democratic and pro-reform forces strongly call for making the "election" an opportunity of establishing a system whereby to achieve national independence and north-south reconciliation and implement the north-south joint declarations. 
					
					 This cannot but be a big threat to the U.S. as it mulls strengthening the domination over south Korea after focusing its strategy for world domination on the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					 The U.S. tricksters' south Korean junket to tap "presidential" candidates' "views on the north" fully reveals such uneasiness. 
					
					 However, the U.S. sinister intention can never come true in south Korea where independence against the U.S. and national reconciliation have become a trend of the times.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Motive of Japan's Loudmouthed "Peace"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Motive of Japan's Loudmouthed "Peace"
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Recently the defense minister of Japan ordered the dispatch of Ground "Self-Defense Force" to South Sudan. Japan which had already dispatched hundreds of GSDF there is claiming that it is to contribute to the "UN peace-keeping activities".
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 It is a stereotyped method of Japan to trumpet about "ensuring peace and security" whenever an opportunity presents itself.
					
					 "Peace" touted by the Japanese reactionaries is a version of a war scenario, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 An ulterior purpose is sought by Japan's noisy trumpeting about its participation in "UN peace-keeping activities" as it has long abused the signboard of "peace".
					
					 As a matter of fact, Japan has restored its right to belligerency and right to participate in a war though it had been deprived of them as a defeated state. However, a wartime system has been established there and almost all legal and institutional machines, once impediments to arms race and overseas military operations, were removed.
					
					 Japan has converted its SDF into full-fledged armed forces of offensive nature. It has become, therefore, an essential requirement for launching reinvasion to ensure the right to overseas military operation.
					
					 Japan is becoming so zealously in taking part in "UN peace-keeping activities" neither at the request of someone nor for contributing to peace-keeping activities.
					
					 It is prompted by its wild ambition for overseas expansion from A to Z. It is the ulterior design of the Japanese reactionaries to let the SDF accumulate experience in actual battles and lay a springboard for reinvasion through persistent overseas troops dispatch in a bid to spark off a war for reinvasion with ease.
					
					 It is natural for the world community to be vigilant against Japan's zealously involvement in "UN peace-keeping activities" under the signboard of "peace" after being revived and rearmed with the U.S. backing. 
					
					 Only self-destruction awaits the Japanese reactionaries now aboard a militarist chariot just as the Japanese imperialists suffered a defeat while going frantic with aggression and war under the signboard of "peace".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Eliminating "Saenuri Party"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Eliminating "Saenuri Party
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The gentries of the "Saenuri Party" of south Korea are running the whole gamut of sleight of hand to cover up their despicable nature as traitors and win popular mind-set.     Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a bylined article in this regard:
					 The history of the party is stained with the blood shed by guiltless people killed at the points of bayonets of the fascist junta.
					
					 The present Lee Myung Bak regime is ill-famed for being a fascist dictatorial junta putting all the preceding regimes into the shade.
					
					 This glaringly shows the true colors of the group as fascist gangsters. All sorts of crimes committed by the group include the revival of the erstwhile dictatorial system, the fascist rackets kicked up to put media under its control, brutal crackdown upon progressive organizations and personages and illegal investigation of civilians.  
					
					 It is foolish, indeed, to try to cover up such snowballing crimes through the hypocritical "revamping" farce.
					
					 This party sold off the dignity and interests of the nation to outside forces, lock, stock and barrel. This is the most hideous crimes committed by the party, a group of wicked sycophants and traitors.
					
					 They were the predecessors of the party that ignited a war of aggression against compatriots in collusion with outside forces, utterly indifferent to the destiny of the country and the nation, and built a high barrier dividing the nation into two parts in pursuance of outside forces' "two Koreas" policy.
					
					 The Korean nation still remains split, though nearly seven decades have passed since the country's division. This is because such successive wicked traitors have pursued permanent division and confrontation with compatriots in collusion with outside forces, staying in power. 
					
					 The reality goes to clearly prove that the inter-Korean confrontation is bound to be escalated, much less realizing the people's desire for progress and reforms, and a war is bound to break out on this land unless the nation eliminates the south Korean right-wing conservative forces including the gentries of the "Saenuri Party" going against the country and the nation, blinded by their greed for power.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Crackdown upon Unified Progressive Party
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Crackdown upon Unified Progressive Party
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities staged a search and confiscation operation against the Unified Progressive Party with a huge police force involved on May 21. This was hooliganism and unprecedented political terrorism perpetrated by gangsters who know nothing about politics. 
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says this in a bylined commentary.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the group of traitors conducted the above-said operation under the pretext of linkage with the north, crying out for "the elimination of the forces following the north." This was one more unpardonable politically-motivated provocation against the DPRK, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					  It is the consistent principled stand of the DPRK to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the great programme for reunification common to the nation, through the concerted efforts of the Koreans and thus improve the inter-Korean relations and reunify the country independently.
					
					 If the group wants the improved inter-Korean relations and independent reunification, it should favor the activities of the party.
					
					 What matters is that why the group is going on such fascist rampage, linking the party with the north. In a word, it is blinded by its ambition to stay in power through the "presidential" election in December.
					
					  The south Korean people are stepping up the preparations to judge the group of traitors in the "presidential" election. This poses a great threat to the "Saenuri Party" keen to stay in power.
					
					 The racket for "eliminating the forces following the north" was kicked up by  traitor Lee Myung Bak and the "Saenuri Party" led by Park Geun Hye to crack down upon the Unified Progressive Party and break the solidarity among opposition parties in a bid to realize its wild ambition to stay in power.
					
					  The above-said search and confiscation operation against the party is a curtain raiser to the campaign to stifle the progressive forces of south Korea on charges of their linkage with the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Augmenting Might of Songun to Maximum
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Augmenting Might of Songun to Maximum
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche" serves as highly important guidelines for increasing the might of Songun to the maximum, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a bylined article.
					 The work, published on April 6, 2012, clarifies the fundamental principle and ways for further consolidating the politico-ideological might and military and technological capacity of the Korean revolutionary armed forces. It also comprehensively deals with overall issues arising in bolstering up the military capacity including mission and role of the Korean People's Army as a driving force for the revolution, improving the living conditions of service personnel, etc.
					
					 The article says:
					
					 It is the immense fortune for the army and people of the DPRK to have received precious guidelines for army building fully consistent with the idea and line of the pioneer of the cause of army building and its leader, the article notes, and goes on: 
					
					 The KPA has performed shining feats to be recorded in the history of the country, holding aloft the slogan "Let us take charge of both the defence of the country and socialist construction under the Songun leadership of the party". It has built great many structures to be always remembered and praised by the people. The relations between the army and people have developed into blood ones rare to be seen in any other country of the world. This history represented a course in which the service personnel's noble traits of not sparing blood and sweat and even their lives for the country and its people have been established throughout the army as an army discipline. 
					
					 The great unity between the army and people will reach the highest level as the most ardent comradely ties and those between comrades-in-arms when the fighting spirit of the KPA and its spirit of "at one go" become the ideology and feelings and traits of all people and they share blood and feelings with each other on the road of the Songun revolution.
					
					 It is the unanimous desire and unshakable will of the army and people of the DPRK to demonstrate before the whole world the dignity and honor of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea, holding higher the banner of Songun with the flow of time, concludes the article.

articles.title: KCNA Hits S. Korean Forces' Reckless Military Moves
articles.content:
KCNA Hits S. Korean Forces' Reckless Military Moves
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers are becoming evermore reckless in their moves to ignite a war against the DPRK.
					 Recently they staged ceaseless adventurous war maneuvers in collusion with the U.S. imperialists including the largest-ever joint air battle drills.
					
					 These are extremely dangerous reckless military moves as they are aimed to tighten the military collusion with the U.S. under the pretext of "additional provocations from the north" and zealously implement the U.S. master's Asian strategy.
					
					 The U.S. is regarding the DPRK, gateway to Northeast Asia, as a stronghold for realizing this strategy.
					
					 Hence, it mapped out a new defense strategy which calls for shifting the centre of its overseas military operation from Europe to the Asia-Pacific region and concentrated huge aggression forces in south Korea and in its vicinity.
					
					 It was none other than the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors which encouraged the U.S. to carry out the above-said strategy. 
					
					 The rat-like Lee group fabricated the "Cheonan warship" incident, providing the U.S. with a pretext for deploying huge aggression forces in south Korea and the rest of the Asia-Pacific region in pursuance of its military domination and staging undisguised war drills there.
					
					 Trumpeting about what it called "provocations", it signed the "plan for jointly coping with the provocation of a local war" together with its U.S. master and is getting frantic with moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The reckless military moves of the U.S. and the Lee warmongers have created a touch-and-go military situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The escalating military tension on the Korean Peninsula is bound to increase the military tension in the rest of Northeast Asia. There is no guarantee that a regional military conflict would not lead to a nuclear war in the region where nuclear powers are concentrated. 
					
					 The reality proves that reckless military provocations of the U.S. and its lackeys Lee group of traitors are the root cause of threatening the peace and stability on the peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia. 
					
					 The rat-like Lee group should be wiped out at an early date as it is a group of harassers and wreckers of peace and security in the peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Call for Lifting of Anti-DPRK Step
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Call for Lifting of Anti-DPRK Step
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Organizations of various strata in south Korea issued a statement on May 24 denouncing the puppet authorities for bedeviling the north-south relations.
					 It is two years since the authorities took the "May 24 step" which calls for terminating south-north exchange and cooperation, escalating joint war drills with the U.S., resuming the psychological warfare against the north, etc, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 This period witnessed such deplorable reality in which military tension between the north and the south was further escalated and all the fruits of cooperation vanished like bubble. All this inflicted great losses upon south Korean businessmen and people.
					
					 It was due to the "May 24 step" that the military's bellicose spirit of inciting military conflict has gone beyond the tolerance limit and the offensive nature of the north-targeted military exercises got more pronounced and  distrust and confrontation between the north and the south is festering with each passing day.
					
					 The statement urged the authorities to face up to the reality and immediately lift the confrontation step in order to put the prevailing situation under control.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Unpopular Healthcare Policy Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Unpopular Healthcare Policy Slammed
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Representatives of civic and public organizations of south Korea including the Headquarters of the All-People Movement for Checking the Privatization of Medical Institutions and Strengthening the Guarantee of Health Insurance and medical experts held a press conference in Seoul on May 23 at which they rejected the puppet authorities' unpopular healthcare policy.
					 Speakers at the press conference said that the present "government' announced last month "regulations for the enforcement of the special law on the designation and operation of zones of economic freedom" which allow the introduction of foreign medical institutions and is mulling discussing  the rules for their enforcement containing details including the standard for establishing hospitals at the "National Assembly".
					
					 According to it, the introduction of such hospitals seeking huge profits is brisk, they noted, and went on:
					
					 The introduction of such hospitals may adversely affect the health of people as doctor's fee is higher than in any other hospitals and their medical technology is low. 
					
					 The "government" claimed that the introduction of such hospitals would be confined to free economic zones, but it is as clear as noonday that this will spill over to all parts of south Korea. 
					
					 Now that FTA has been concluded with the U.S., any action to allow this introduction would entail irrevocable consequences.
					
					 Urging the Lee "government" to retract the introduction of the above-said hospitals which would result in bringing the healthcare field to a collapse, they called upon the people from all walks of life to carry on their actions to check it.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Denounces Suppressing Progressive Forces
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Denounces Suppressing Progressive Forces
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy of south Korea issued a statement on May 24 denouncing the conservative group for desperately cracking down upon the progressive forces.
					 The statement accused the police of searching office rooms of the Solidarity for Workers' Emancipation on charges of "formation of enemy-benefiting organization" and arresting its members on May 22 in the wake of the prosecution's search operation against the Unified Progressive party.
					
					 This was part of the sinister intention to crack down on the progressive forces and create a favorable atmosphere for the conservative forces to stay in power. 
					
					 It was the "Saenuri Party" and the right-wing conservative media that zealously backed the recent racket of crackdown, the statement noted, assailing the conservative forces for frantically supporting the security authorities' whirlwind of arrest, crying out for checking the dominance of the "forces following the north."
					
					 The statement demanded the conservative forces stop the racket for eliminating the "forces following the north" and cease their operations to base actions to undermine the progressive political parties and break the solidarity among the opposition parties.

articles.title: Scandals of Ministry of Land and Seas Denounced by S. Korean Paper
articles.content:
Scandals of Ministry of Land and Seas Denounced by S. Korean Paper
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Kyunghyang Daily News on May 25 carried an editorial denouncing the scandals committed by the Ministry of Land and Seas. 
					It was disclosed that two officials of the ministry involved in the project for improving four rivers were detained by the prosecution for receiving bribes from a construction enterprise, it said. 
					
					It is deplorable to know that there are such dreary corners in ministries and agencies of the "government," the editorial noted, adding that people from all walks of life are critical of them, querying whether the above-said ministry is the ministry in name and reality or a ministry of scandals.
					
					It called for taking the earliest possible strong measures to combat scandals.

articles.title: Equatorial Guinean President Supports Korean People's Just Cause
articles.content:
Equatorial Guinean President Supports Korean People's Just Cause
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The government and people of Equatorial Guinea are greatly satisfied with the steady development of the bilateral relations of friendship provided by President Kim Il Sung in the interests of both countries and peoples. President Obiang Nguema Mbasogo said this, when receiving credentials from Kwak Ji Hwan, new DPRK ambassador to Equatorial Guinea, on May 23.
					 Equatorial Guinea wishes the Korean people greater successes in the struggle to safeguard the sovereignty and achieve reunification under the sagacious leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, he noted, adding it would always extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just cause.
					
					 The imperialists are running the whole gamut of moves to force the DPRK winning one victory after another to yield to them, but the courageous Korean people are waging a heroic struggle to defend their sovereignty and independence, he said, adding that this greatly encourages the people of many countries. 
					
					 Equatorial Guinea will boost the traditional relations of friendship with the DPRK in the future, too, setting store by them, he stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Foreign Papers
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The detailed gist of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche" was carried by the Syrian paper Al Baath on May 21.
					 The work, published on April 6, 2012, clarifies that it is a principled requirement for the victorious advance of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into a glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Pakistani paper Baluchistan Times carried the work on May 20.

articles.title: Books Published in Indonesia
articles.content:
Books Published in Indonesia
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of releasing books titled "President Sukarno and President Kim Il Sung" and "Friendship irrespective of seasons" was held in Indonesia on May 21. They were dedicated to the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were personages of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, Soekarno Foundation for Education, a university, the Indonesia-Korea Association for Friendship and Cultural Exchange, media persons and people from all walks of life.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Indonesia  and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made at the ceremony.
					
					 Rachmawati Soekarnoputri, chairwoman of the Founding Committee of the Soekarno Foundation for Education of Indonesia, highly praised Kim Il Sung as a prominent man widely known worldwide.
					
					 The President, the founder of the Juche idea, not only defended socialism but maintained a steadfast anti-imperialist stand, she said, adding that she would always remember his personality as a great man and live and work, guided by his idea and spirit.
					
					 The chief editor of the Banana Publishing House sincerely hoped that the DPRK would prosper under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un and the bilateral relations of friendship grow stronger in the days ahead.

articles.title: Kwangju Popular Uprising Observed by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kwangju Popular Uprising Observed by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a joint statement on the occasion of the 32nd anniversary of the Kwangju Popular Uprising.
					 On May 18, 1980 Kwangju citizens of south Korea rose up in an uprising against the military fascist dictatorship of the Chun Doo Hwan puppet regime and the U.S. imperialists' policy of colonial rule.
					
					 The uprising recorded a new chapter in the history of resistance for independence, democracy and reunification as a righteous and heroic anti-fascist, anti-imperialist struggle of the south Korean popular masses and revolutionaries, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 The blood shed by the participants in the uprising will not be in vain but they will certainly take revenge upon the oppressors some day.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak puppet fascist regime is facing the second and third Kwangju popular uprising and it is bound to collapse due to the eruption of the pent-up resentment of the south Korean people.
					
					 We pay tribute to the heroic resistance of the uprisers.
					
					 We support the south Korean people's struggle for independence, democracy and reunification.
					
					 And we, at the same time, fully support their struggle to bring down the Lee Myung Bak puppet fascist regime and force the U.S. imperialist Yankees to quit south Korea.

articles.title: DPRK Introduced by Russia, Brazil and Regional Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK Introduced by Russia, Brazil and Regional Organizations
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Internet homepages of Russia, Brazil and a regional organization introduced the DPRK.
					 Internet news Novosti of Russia on May 13 introduced Mt. Paektu, a holy mountain of the Korean revolution. It said:
					
					 Mt. Paektu of Korea occupies an important place among the famous mountains of Asia. There is on the mountain which lies 2,750 meters above the sea level Lake Chon, a beautiful lake.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il was born in a small log cabin in the area of Mt. Paektu. An endless stream of people is visiting his birthplace.
					
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea on May 17 posted on its Internet homepage an article titled "DPRK is directing efforts to land management". The homepage noted:
					
					 Brisk in the DPRK at present is a work to face-lift the land as befitting the one of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his work "On Effecting a Drastic Turn in Land Management to Meet the Requirements for Building a Thriving Socialist Nation" underscored the need for the whole party and army and all people to more dynamically conduct the general mobilization movement for land management.
					
					 Not only Pyongyang but all other parts of the country are alive with a drive to implement the tasks set forth in his work.
					
					 Running very high is the enthusiasm of Pyongyangites to build it into a city lying in a park with good greenery and a magnificent and picturesque world class city. There sprang up fashionable apartment houses in the heart of the city and greening and tree planting are under way.
					
					 The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions on May 8 posted on its Internet homepage an article and photos showing the construction of the Mansudae area.

articles.title: Tanzania Reiterates Ban on Foreign Currency Use in Domestic Transactions
articles.content:
Tanzania Reiterates Ban on Foreign Currency Use in Domestic Transactions
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Tanzanian government has reiterated its resolve to ban the use of foreign currencies, especially the U.S. dollar, in buying and selling goods and services in the country, local media reported on May 24. 
					 "It is not allowed for people and businesspeople to use foreign currencies in buying and selling goods and services in the local market," said the deputy finance minister Janet Mbene in Arusha, northern Tanzania.
					
					 "We are studying the trend and we'll talk to the business community involved in such businesses and encourage them to start using our Tanzanian shilling instead of the U.S. dollar in their transactions," she was quoted by the Guardian newspaper as saying.
					
					 The official when opening a two-day seminar on financial markets and financial institutions said transaction in foreign currencies in local market contributed to the devaluation of the Tanzanian shilling against major international currencies.

articles.title: Africa Day Observed in South Africa
articles.content:
Africa Day Observed in South Africa
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- South Africans marked Africa Day on May 25.
					 In a speech marking the event, President Jacob Zuma said that while the African continent should promote Afro-optimism, challenges such as possibly not meeting the Millennium Development Goals (MDGs) deadline must be addressed.
					
					 Zuma called on Africa to reverse "self-hate and Afro-pessimism," saying, "We must promote the principles of self-love, Afro- optimism."
					
					 "We are now one people, and must work together for the betterment of the peoples of African descent, regardless of geographical borders."

articles.title: Corea y China se cooperan en dominio comercial
articles.content:
Corea y China se cooperan en dominio comercial
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ACNC) -- Quedo rubricado este martes en esta capital la nota de entendimiento sobre la cooperacion entre la Oficina de Marcas, Disenos Industriales y Nombres de Lugar de Origen de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Administracion Estatal de Industria y Comercio de China. 
					En la ceremonia de firmas estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana el director general Ri Tong Chan y otros miembros de la entidad mencionada, y por la china, los miembros de la delegacion de la citada entidad encabezada por su viceministro Fu Shuangjian y un miembro de la sede diplomatica en Corea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela intento de EE.UU. de mantener poder proyanqui
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela intento de EE.UU. de mantener poder proyanqui
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ACNC) -- En visperas de las "elecciones presidenciales" programadas para diciembre que viene en el Sur de Corea, un especialista en el problema de la Peninsula Coreana del Centro Norteamericano para los Estudios Estrategicos e Internacionales y los ex altos funcionarios de EE.UU. viajaron a Seul para sondear el "punto de vista del Norte de Corea" de Park Geun-hye y otros candidatos presidenciales.
					 En un comentario individual difundido al respecto este martes, el periodico Rodong Sinmun lo califica de intervencion abierta en los asuntos internos del Sur de Corea y continua:
					
					 Detras de eso esta la siniestra intencion de prolongar el sistema de dictadura proyanqui en el Sur de Corea sofocando el creciente clima pro-reunificacion independiente y protegiendo a las fuerzas conservadoras ultraderechistas.
					
					  Es un secreto descifrado que EE.UU. viene manejando hasta ahora a sus conveniencias el circulo politico del Sur de Corea.
					
					  Lo alarmante del caso es que los conspiradores norteamericanos estan interesados mucho en sondear la opinion de los candidatos presidenciales sobre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Ahora las fuerzas reformistas democraticas del Sur de Corea demandan fuertemente convertir las "elecciones presidenciales" en una ocasion para establecer un regimen capaz de lograr la independencia nacional y la reconciliacion Norte-Sur e implementar las declaraciones aprobadas entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					  Esto constituye una gran amenaza para EE.UU. que intenta fortalecer el dominio sobre el Sur de Corea enfocando su estrategia de hegemonia mundial en la region de Asia-Pacifico.
					
					  Las recientes visitas de los conspiradores estadounidenses al Sur de Corea son una expresion de tal inquietud.
					
					  Pero el astuto intento del imperio no se realizara nunca en el Sur de Corea donde la independencia antiyanqui y la reconciliacion nacional se hacen una tendencia de la epoca.

articles.title: Minju Joson critica represion al Partido Progresista Unido en Sudcorea
articles.content:
Minju Joson critica represion al Partido Progresista Unido en Sudcorea
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ACNC) -- A las ordenes de las autoridades surcoreanas, muchos policias cometieron el dia 21 el registro forzado y la confiscacion en la sede del Partido Progresista Unido. 
					En un comentario individual divulgado este martes, el periodico Minju Joson lo califica de canallada y terrorismo politico sin precedentes en la historia, y continua: 
					
					Lo mas grave del incidente reside en que la banda de traidores surcoreanos cometio esa barbaridad preconizando la "eliminacion de las fuerzas pro-Norte", lo cual significa otra imperdonable provocacion politica anti-RPDC.
					
					La RPDC mantiene su invariable posicion de principios de mejorar las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y reunificar la patria de manera independiente con las fuerzas unidas de la nacion y mediante la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, gran programa comun de la nacion, y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas desean la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y la reunificacion independiente de la patria, deberan fomentar las actividades del Partido Progresista Unido. 
					
					Al reprimir de manera fascista esa agrupacion politica vinculandola con la RPDC, los traidores surcoreanos tratan de retomar el poder al ganar las "elecciones presidenciales" de diciembre venidero.
					
					Ahora, los habitantes surcoreanos estan preparandose para castigar a la camarilla de titeres en dichos comicios, lo cual amenaza seriamente al "Partido Saenuri" que desea repetir el mandato. 
					
					De ahi que el traidor Lee Myung Bak, Park Geun-hye y otros compinches del "Partido Saenuri" lanzan la campana de "purga de las fuerzas pro-Norte" con el fin de destruir la alianza de la oposicion mediante la represion contra el Partido Progresista Unido. 
					
					El registro forzado y la confiscacion contra el PPU son el preludio de la limpieza de las fuerzas progresistas surcoreanas, supuestamente vinculadas con la RPDC.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun aboga por eliminar "Partido Saenuri" del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun aboga por eliminar "Partido Saenuri" del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun inserto el dia 29 un articulo individual de condena a los compinches del "Partido Saenuri" que se valen de todos los medios para encubrir su vil naturaleza traidora y atraer la opinion publica.
					La historia de esta entidad politica esta manchada de sangre de los habitantes inocentes, senala el diario y continua:
					
					El actual "poder" de Lee Myung Bak es el infame grupo de dictadores fascistas que superan a sus antecedentes.
					
					El renacimiento del regimen dictatorial, el alboroto para controlar la prensa, la represion sangrienta a las entidades y personalidades progresistas, la inspeccion ilegal a los civiles y otros crimenes cometidos por la banda de traidores, demuestran fehacientemente la naturaleza fascista de estos delincuentes.
					
					Es tan absurdo tapar tales crimenes enormes con la "renovacion".
					
					Uno de los archi-crimenes cometidos por el "Partido Saenuri", banda de los traidores serviles a grandes potencias, es que entrego totalmente la dignidad y los intereses de la nacion a las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					Sus predecesores provocaron la guerra contra los compatriotas en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras menospreciando el destino del pais y nacion y construyeron la muralla de hormigon, simbolo de division nacional, adhiriendose a las maniobras de fabricacion de "dos Coreas" de las fuerzas foraneas. 
					
					La nacion coreana no realizo su reunificacion todavia aunque paso casi 70 anos desde su division, porque al tomar el poder, los traidores surcoreanos han venido recurriendo a la division y la confrontacion fratricida en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					La realidad demuestra claramente que mientras existan la banda traidora del dicho partido enloquecida por la ambicion de tomar el poder y otras fuerzas ultraderechistas y conservadoras del Sur de Corea, no se podra realizar la aspiracion de la opinion publica al progreso y la reforma, sino se estallara solo en esta tierra la guerra por la exacerbacion de la confrontacion intercoreana.

articles.title: ACNC comenta aventuras militares de belicistas surcoreanos
articles.content:
ACNC comenta aventuras militares de belicistas surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ACNC) -- Se tornan cada vez mas aventureros los ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC que libran los belicistas surcoreanos.
					Solo en los dias recientes, ellos desarrollaron junto con Estados Unidos los ejercicios militares de distintos tipos, incluso la maniobra aerea de maxima dimension en la historia, con el objetivo de fortalecer la cooperacion militar con EE.UU. bajo el pretexto de "provocacion adicional del Norte" y sumarse a la estrategia norteamericana sobre Asia. 
					
					Ahora EE.UU. considera la RPDC, puerta del Nordeste Asiatico, como un punto importante para la realizacion de su estrategia sobre Asia. 
					
					En ese contexto, elaboro la nueva estrategia de defensa nacional de desplazar el enfoque de sus operaciones militares en ultramar desde Europa a la region de Asia-Pacifico y desplego enormes fuerzas armadas agresoras en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno.
					
					Al inventar el caso de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan", la horda ratonesca de Lee dio a EE.UU., que pretende tomar el dominio militar en la Peninsula Coreana y la region de Asia-Pacifico, el pretexto de emplazar las fuerzas armadas agresoras y comenzar abiertamente los ejercicios militares en la region. 
					
					Ademas, hablando de la supuesta "provocacion", firmo con su amo norteamericano el "plan de operaciones conjuntas para hacer frente a la provocacion local". 
					
					Debido a las descabelladas acciones militares de EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos, la Peninsula Coreana se encuentra en el estado extremadamente tenso que puede desencadenar una guerra en cualquier momento.
					
					La agravacion de la tension militar en la Peninsula Coreana produce el efecto domino en el Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					No hay garantia de que un conflicto armado en esta region, donde estan concentrados los paises con armas nucleares, no se extendera a una guerra nuclear. 
					
					La realidad muestra que la amenaza a la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico proviene de las provocaciones militares de EE.UU. y la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak, lacayo del imperio. 
					
					Debe ser eliminada cuanto antes la horda ratonesca de Lee Myung Bak, perturbadora de la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico.
